name: Earth
story: You start at Earth, Get ready for the adventure
nav: Press 2 to go to the Moon, 3 to go to Mars, 4 to go to Mecury

name: Moon
story: You have arrived to the Moon, look at Earth from here! Everything so beautiful
nav: Press 5 to go to the Sun, 6 to go to Jupiter, 7 to go to Saturn

name: Mars
story: You are the first person in the world on Mars, let's take some self-face and post on social media
nav: From Mars press 10 to go to Mercury, 11 to go to Pluto, and to come back to Earth press 1

name: Mercury
story: You are on Mercury!
nav: Press 10 to go to XVI planet, 11 to go to Pluto,  and to come back to Earth press 1

name: Sun
story: It is too hot! You are die!

name: Jupiter
story: Welcome to Jupiter!
nav: Press 12 to go to Dreaming Galaxy

name: Saturn
story: You just got into Saturn, take a look around!
nav: Press 12 to go to Dreaming Galaxy, 8 to go to Venus

name: Venus
story: You are here in Venus! Let prepare for new challenges
nav: Press 13 to go to Giant Planet, 3 to go back to Mars

name: Uranus
story: You are in Uranus. Are you ready to go to Comic?
nav: Press 14 to go to Comic

name: XVI
story: You are on a planet called XVI.
nav: Press 15 to go to XVII, 4 to go back to Mercury

name: Pluto
story: Pluto planet welcome you!
nav: Press 16 to go to Cat planet, 4 to go back to Mercury

name: Dreaming Galaxy
story: You are entering Dreaming Galaxy. Try to not fall as sleep
nav: Press 17 to go to Golden Planet

name: Giant Planet
story: You are on Giant Planet. Don't make any noise otherwise they will wake up
nav: Press 17 to go to Golden Planet, 18 to go to Health Planet

name: Comic
story: You get on a Comic, You can fly with a light speed!
nav: Press 17 to go to Golden Planet, 18 to go to Health Planet, 19 to go to Magic Planet

name: XVII
story: You are on XVII and Do you know what is waiting you?
nav: Press 22 to go to Alien 2

name: Cat Planet
story: You are so lucky you have arrived on Cat Planet. Look at those cats they are so cute!
nav: Press 19 go to Magic Planet, and 11 to go back to Pluto

name: Golden Planet
story: You gotta be rich when you can get here on Golden Planet. Look around it is real gold
nav: Press 20 to go to Black Hole, 21 to go to Alien 1

name: Health Planet
story: If you feel tired. Finally, you got to the right destination. It is Health Planet, the water here will help you to recover after a long fly.
nav: Press 22 to go to Alien 2

name: Magic Planet
story: Welcome to Magic Planet! Let guess where you are going to next
nav: Press 22 to go to Alien 2, 23 to go to Death Planet

name: Black Hole
story: Nothing can escape from a Black Hole even light. You are die!

name: Alien 1
story: You need to fight to win or you have to go back to Earth

name: Alien 2
story: You need to fight to win or you have to go back to Earth

name: Death Planet
story: Welcome to Death Planet. Are you going to Reverse?
nav: Press 22 back to Alien 2, 24 to enter Reverse

name: Reverse
story: I am sorry.The storm here is just too strong and flew you to the Earth!
nav: Press 1 to start again!

name: Infinity Planet
story: You win! You are in Infinity Planet where you have a power that you can get whatever you want!
